co2-calculation:
Assumption of mixture:
50% white flour, 20% rye flour, 10% sunflower seeds, 10% oat flakes, 5% maize flour, 5% millet flour. CO2 values from the EDB. Millet flour equals millet + milling process. 
Estimation of milling process (white flour (0.51 kg CO2e/kg) - grains (0.42 kg CO2e/kg) = 0.09 kg CO2e/kg flour) (3). 

Mixture:
0.5 * 0.51 + 0.2 * 0.53 + 0.1 * 1.15 + 0.1 * 0.58 + 0.05 * 0.71 + 0.05 * (0.27+0.09) = 0.5875 kg CO2e/kg flour
references:
1. Possible ingredient list http://www.muehle-burgholz.ch/fileadmin/user_upload/PDF/Multikorn_hell_D.pdf
2. Possible ingredient list http://www.muehle-burgholz.ch/fileadmin/user_upload/PDF/
Multikorn_dunkel_D.pdf
3. Tabelle ZHAW: Kreuzer_2014_Treibhauspotenziale_Nahrungsmittel_eaternity_v2.0_EH;
calculation-process-documentation:
mixture of different grains, seeds and flours.

Possible mixture: white flour, spelt wheat flour, rye flour, sunflower seeds, flax seeds, oat flakes, barley flour, sesame seeds, buckwheat, soy flour, oat groats, maize flour, millet flakes, gluten, backing supplement, malt flour (1, 2)
name: Multikornmehl
